shingling
=========

a wshingling is a set of unique 'shingles'
—contiguous subsequences of tokens in a document—that can be
used to gauge the similarity of two documents. The w denotes
the number of tokens in each shingle in the set.English, Hindi,
Malayalam, Kannada, Bengali suported now.

-------------

   :members:
